original: intros. split. - induction ll. + simpl. constructor. + simpl. constructor. * apply H. left. reflexivity. * apply IHll. intros. apply H. right. auto. - intros. induction ll. + simpl in H. constructor. + simpl in H. inversion H. subst. constructor. * apply H2. * apply IHll. apply H3.
